full_description: Use the right arm to pick up the seal and perform two cycles of stamping on six pads in a specific sequence.
schema: {A} notifies pad 1, {B} notifies pad 2, {C} notifies pad 3, {D} notifies pad 4, {E} notifies pad 5, {F} notifies pad 6, {a} notifies the right arm
preference: num of words should not exceed 15. Degree of detail avg is six.
seen: Pick up the seal with {a} and stamp pads in the order 1-5-3-4-2-6.
Use {a} to grasp the seal and complete two stamping cycles on all pads.
Sequence {a} to stamp {A}, {E}, {C}, {D}, {B}, and {F} twice.
Grasp the seal with {a} then stamp each pad following the 1-5-3-4-2-6 order.
Perform two full stamping rotations across {A} through {F} using {a}.
Carry the seal with {a} to stamp {A}, {E}, {C}, {D}, {B}, {F} sequentially.
Use {a} to stamp the red pads in the prescribed numerical sequence twice.
Complete the 1-5-3-4-2-6 stamping pattern twice using the right arm {a}.
Pick the seal and let {a} stamp pads starting with {A} and {E}.
Follow the sequence 1-5-3-4-2-6 to stamp all pads twice with {a}.
Execute two rounds of stamping on {A} to {F} with the seal.
Use {a} to move the seal across pads in the specified 1-5-3-4-2-6 order.
Finish two cycles of stamping {A}, {E}, {C}, {D}, {B}, and {F}.
Grip the seal using {a} and stamp the designated pads in order.
Cycle the seal through pads 1, 5, 3, 4, 2, and 6 twice.
Employ {a} to pick the seal and stamp the six red pads.
Repeat the 1-5-3-4-2-6 stamping sequence for two full environmental demonstrations.
Direct {a} to stamp {A} then {E} then others in the loop.
Use the right arm {a} to stamp every pad in the fixed sequence.
Stamp pads {A}, {E}, {C}, {D}, {B}, {F} twice using the seal.
unseen: Complete two cycles of the 1-5-3-4-2-6 stamping task with {a}.
Stamp all six pads twice in the designated order using the seal.
Use {a} to rotate the seal through the six pads twice.
Finish the stamping pattern on {A} through {F} for two rounds.
Sequence the seal to hit all six target pads in two loops.
